name: Flee the Dungeon
description:
Can you escape from the terrible dungeon????

Know your enemies... Choose your upgrades wisely... And escape with dignity...

You must knock out all the minions hiding in the dungeon in this turn-based game. You can choose a single upgrade after every round.

There are 9 levels in the current prototype.

If you liked the idea, please leave a comment.

Submitted for the Weekly Game Jam#193 "Turn-Based".

This is a prototype project and feedback would be appreciated.
